name: The Life Of Pix
description: Play through this hard bullet hell adventure game, where you play as the annoying helper that you have always wanted to kill and it appears somebody else has that very same idea. even though our hero hates your guts and refuses to care about the safety of the world you must guide him through villages and caves. Until your able to sneak your way into the evil wizards lair and destroy his evil brew that he plans to take over the whole world with!
